scripts.deploy: npm run api:deploy && npm run frontend:deploy
scripts.aws:config: aws configure set aws_access_key_id "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" --profile "$AWS_PROFILE" && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_SECRET" --profile user2 && aws configure set region "$AWS_REGION" && aws configure set output "json"
scripts.eb:init: cd udagram/udagram-api && eb init udagram-api --platform node.js --region "$AWS_REGION"
